content.TLDR: Thanks to advancements in deep learning (DL), automatic music transcription (AMT) systems recently outperformed previous ones fully based on manual feature design. Many of these highly capable DL models, however, are computationally expensive. Researchers
content.abstract:
Thanks to advancements in deep learning (DL), automatic music transcription (AMT) systems recently outperformed previous ones fully based on manual feature design. Many of these highly capable DL models, however, are computationally expensive. Researchers

[Direct link to video](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1yFCCW_X06c_V-Q_xlfOnCbM8JoNzIVtu)
content.title: TriAD: Capturing harmonics with 3D Convolutions
